Kangana Ranaut Targets Hrithik Roshan Once Again, Insists That No One Should Work With Him
As more and more sexual harassment allegations against people are cropping up in the wake of #MeToo movement, which has finally hit India harder, our hearts are breaking to read what these women have gone through keeping all these incidents to themselves as a secret for as long as 19 years.
It all started with Tanushree Dutta’s allegations against Nana Patekar, after which even actress Kangana Ranaut broke her silence and revealed her #MeToo story involving Queen director Vikas Bahl.
Also Read: After Tanushree Dutta, Kangana Ranaut Takes #MeToo Forward, Accuses ‘Queen’ Director Of Sexual Misconduct
In the wake of the #MeToo movement, Kangana Ranaut has recently targeted Hrithik Roshan once again. She wants the industry to not work with him.
“Whatever is happening with Vikas Bahl is absolutely correct. Our industry still has a lot of people who don't behave well with women. They assault them, they harass them, they should also be punished”
“People who keep their wives as trophies and keep young girls as their mistresses should also be punished,” she told Zee News in an interview.

When asked who she was talking about, Kangana Ranaut, said, “I am referring to Hrithik Roshan, people should not work with him as well.”
Kangana Ranaut and Hrithik Roshan, who were allegedly dating at one point of time, had a public fallout involving mudslinging and a slew of legal notices.
